item.title: Emerson 称以每股 265 美元竞购 Aspen 是 "最佳和最终 "出价
item.description: 艾默生电气周一表示，收购 Aspen Technology 的每股 265 美元报价是其 "最佳和最终 "价格。【原文：Emerson Electric said on Monday that its $265 per-share offer to acquire Aspen Technology was its "best and final" price.】

item.title: 法国人工智能峰会 1100 亿欧元投资承诺详情
item.description: 法国总统埃马纽埃尔-马克龙（Emmanuel Macron）周一宣布了在未来几年内支持法国人工智能产业的投资承诺，总额达1090亿欧元（约合1120亿美元）。【原文：French President Emmanuel Macron on Monday announced investment pledges to bolster France's artificial intelligence sector totalling 109 billion euros ($112 billion)over the coming years.】

item.title: 特朗普加征关税后，美国铜价溢价飙升至创纪录水平
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普推进对工业金属征收关税的计划后，美国铜价周一大幅上涨。【原文：The price of copper in the United States rocketed on Monday after U.S. President Donald Trump pushed forward his plans to slap tariffs on industrial metals.】

item.title: 尽管美国最高法院胜诉，瑞银举报人的判决仍被驳回
item.description: 周一，一名曾说服美国最高法院让企业举报人更容易赢得报复诉讼的前瑞银债券策略师遭遇挫折，因为陪审团判决他赔偿拖欠工资和其他损失的裁决被驳回。【原文：A former UBS bond strategist who persuaded the U.S. Supreme Court to make it easier for corporate whistleblowers to win retaliation lawsuits suffered a setback on Monday, as a jury verdict awarding him back pay and other damages was thrown out.】

item.title: 马克龙推广法国电动人工智能
item.description: 法国总统埃马纽埃尔-马克龙（Emmanuel Macron）周一宣布，法国正在参与人工智能竞赛，并呼吁巴黎人工智能行动峰会的与会者选择欧洲来满足他们的业务需求。【原文：French President Emmanuel Macron declared on Monday that France was in the race for artificial intelligence and called on attendees at the AI Action Summit in Paris to choose Europe for their business needs.】

item.title: 尽管贸易战令人担忧，但油价仍在攀升
item.description: 尽管投资者仍然担心美国总统唐纳德-特朗普可能会发动贸易战，但油价在连续第三周下跌后于周一反弹。【原文：Oil prices rebounded on Monday after posting their third straight week of losses, even though investors remained worried that U.S. President Donald Trump might start a trade war.】

item.title: 人工智能芯片初创公司 Groq 获得沙特阿拉伯 15 亿美元的投资承诺
item.description: 半导体初创公司 Groq 周一表示，它已获得沙特阿拉伯 15 亿美元的承诺，以扩大向该国交付其先进的人工智能芯片。【原文：Semiconductor startup Groq said on Monday it has secured a $1.5 billion commitment from Saudi Arabia to expand the delivery of its advanced AI chips to the country.】

item.title: 黄金多头锁定闪耀里程碑；3000 美元/盎司指日可待
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）最新的关税威胁再次点燃了黄金热潮，将避险金属推向新的高度，并将闪闪发光的3000美元里程碑带入人们的视野。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump's latest tariff threats have ignited another gold rush, propelling the safe-haven metal to new heights and bringing the glittering $3,000 milestone into view.】

item.title: 法国反垄断机构就必应访问问题调查微软
item.description: 法国反垄断机构正在对微软进行调查，因为该机构担心，当较小的竞争对手付费在自己的搜索引擎产品中使用必应技术时，会降低搜索结果的质量。【原文：France's antitrust agency is investigating Microsoft over concerns that it is degrading the quality of results when smaller rivals pay to use Bing technology in their own search-engine products.】

item.title: 劳动力和通胀将拖累金矿企业业绩
item.description: 分析师们表示，劳动力成本上升和通胀高企可能会在2025年继续拖累金矿企业的利润，但黄金价格的飙升仍会增加自由现金流。【原文：Higher labor costs and sticky inflation could continue to weigh on gold miners' profits going into 2025, analysts said, but soaring prices of the yellow metal should still boost free cash flow.】

item.title: 消息人士称微软将调整Office-Teams定价以避免欧盟反垄断罚款
item.description: 据三位消息人士透露，微软已提出扩大其 Office 产品与聊天和视频应用程序 Teams 之间的价格差异，以避免可能被欧盟处以反垄断罚款。【原文：Microsoft has offered to widen the price differential between its Office product sold with its chat and video app Teams and its software sold without the app in a bid to avert a possible EU antitrust fine, according to three sources.】

item.title: 墨西哥总统表示，墨西哥将等待特朗普可能征收钢铝关税后再做出反应
item.description: 墨西哥总统克劳迪娅-希恩鲍姆（Claudia Sheinbaum）周一表示，作为向美国出口钢铁最多的国家，墨西哥将等待美国总统唐纳德-特朗普是否宣布对进口钢铁和铝征收关税，然后再做出反应。【原文：Mexico, a top shipper of steel to the United States, will wait to see if U.S. President Donald Trump announces tariffs on steel and aluminum imports before reacting, President Claudia Sheinbaum said on Monday.】

item.title: EDP Renewables 与微软签署虚拟购电协议
item.description: EDP Renewables 北美公司周一表示，该公司已交付了三个公用事业规模的太阳能项目，并与科技巨头微软公司签署了长期虚拟购电协议。【原文：EDP Renewables North America said on Monday it has delivered three utility-scale solar projects and signed a long-term virtual power purchase agreement with tech giant Microsoft .】

item.title: Salesforce 计划在沙特阿拉伯进行 5 亿美元的人工智能相关投资
item.description: 云软件销售商 Salesforce 周一表示，公司计划在沙特阿拉伯投资 5 亿美元用于人工智能领域，因为各国都在竞相争取对这一新兴但至关重要的技术进行投资。【原文：Cloud software seller Salesforce said on Monday that it plans to invest $500 million in Saudi Arabia related to artificial intelligence, as countries compete to secure investments in the nascent but critical technology.】

item.title: 独家消息消息人士称，德国默克集团正在洽谈收购美国癌症生物技术公司 Springworks
item.description: 据知情人士透露，德国医疗保健与技术集团默克公司（Merck KGaA）正在就收购美国癌症与罕见病制药商 Springworks Therapeutics 公司进行深入谈判。【原文：Merck KGaA , the German healthcare and technology group, is in advanced talks to acquire U.S. cancer and rare diseases drugmaker Springworks Therapeutics , according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 福克斯公司收购视频播客公司 Red Seat Ventures
item.description: 福克斯公司周一表示，它收购了数字媒体公司 Red Seat Ventures，该公司的客户包括前福克斯新闻明星梅根-凯利（Megyn Kelly）和塔克-卡尔森（Tucker Carlson），以开发年轻受众和日益增长的播客市场。【原文：Fox Corp said on Monday it bought Red Seat Ventures, the digital media company whose clients include former Fox News stars Megyn Kelly and Tucker Carlson, in a bid to tap younger audiences and the growing podcast market.】

item.title: Lyft 将 "最快于 2026 年 "推出 Mobileye 动力机器人出租车
item.description: 美国打车公司Lyft首席执行官大卫-里舍（David Risher）周一在X网站上发表文章称，Lyft正计划 "最快于2026年 "在达拉斯为其应用程序推出由Mobileye公司提供技术支持的全自动机器人出租车。【原文：U.S. ride-hailing firm Lyft is planning to launch fully autonomous robotaxis, powered by Mobileye , to its app "as soon as 2026" in Dallas, CEO David Risher said in a post on X on Monday.】

item.title: 穆迪警告称，如果特朗普取消对世界银行的支持，将面临三A级威胁
item.description: 信用评级机构穆迪（Moody's）警告说，如果美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）下令对世界银行和其他顶级多边贷款机构进行审查后，美国撤回对这些机构的支持，那么世界银行和其他顶级多边贷款机构的三A评级将面临风险。【原文：The triple-A ratings of the World Bank and other top multilateral lenders would be at risk if the United States withdraws support for them following a review ordered by U.S. President Donald Trump, credit rating agency Moody's warned.】

item.title: 解说员：欧盟在应对特朗普关税方面有哪些选择？
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）表示，他将在下周对进口钢铁和铝征收关税，并提高税率以与其他国家的税率相匹敌。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump has said he will impose tariffs on imports of steel and aluminium and raise rates to match those of other countries in the coming week.】

item.title: CFPB 代理主管要求所有员工停止 "任何工作任务
item.description: 根据路透社看到的一封电子邮件，唐纳德-特朗普总统新上任的美国消费者金融保护局局长周一指示该机构的所有工作人员停止从事任何工作。【原文：President Donald Trump's newly installed chief of the U.S. Consumer Financial Protection Bureau on Monday directed all of the agency's workers to desist from performing any work, according to an email seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 美元因关税威胁而坚挺，股市震荡反弹
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普警告即将征收包括钢铁和铝在内的更多关税后，美元周一走高，尽管美国期货和欧洲股市摆脱了即将到来的征税而上涨。【原文：The dollar edged higher on Monday after U.S. President Donald Trump warned more tariffs were imminent including on steel and aluminium, although U.S. futures and European stocks shrugged off the looming levies and rose.】

item.title: 莫迪访美在关税威胁下燃起业界希望
item.description: 印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）从周三开始对美国进行为期两天的访问，预计他将在与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的会晤中提议削减关税并增加能源和国防进口。【原文：Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi, on a two-day U.S. visit starting Wednesday, is expected to propose tariff cuts and increased energy and defence imports during a meeting with U.S. President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 日本软银集团季度利润达 15 亿美元
item.description: 日本软银集团（SoftBank Group）周三将实现 2,340 亿日元（15.4 亿美元）的季度净利润，原因是其持有的电信公司股价上涨，Swiggy 上市后的表现也提升了其未上市科技初创公司投资组合的价值。【原文：Japan's SoftBank Group is set to make a quarterly net profit of 234 billion yen ($1.54 billion) on Wednesday as shares in its telecommunications holdings edge up and the post-listing performance of Swiggy is seen boosting the value of its portfolio of unlisted technology startups.】

item.title: 巴西否认特朗普征收钢铁关税后可能对美国科技公司征税的报道
item.description: 巴西财政部长周一拒绝了一份报告，该报告称，如果唐纳德-特朗普总统继续实施对所有美国进口钢铁征收25%关税的计划，巴西正计划对美国科技公司征税。【原文：Brazil's finance minister rejected on Monday a report saying the country was planning to impose taxes on U.S. tech companies if President Donald Trump proceeds with plans to introduce a 25% tariff on all U.S. steel imports.】

item.title: 精神航空系统公司（Spirit AeroSystems）因波音公司重启生产，预计季度收入高于预期
item.description: 精神航空系统公司（Spirit AeroSystems）周一表示，受该公司最大客户波音公司（Boeing）重启生产的影响，预计该公司季度收入将高于预期。【原文：Spirit AeroSystems said on Monday it expects to post a higher-than-expected quarterly revenue, driven by restarted production at the aerospace supplier's biggest customer, Boeing .】

item.title: 加拿大道明银行将退出价值 154 亿美元的嘉信理财股份
item.description: 多伦多道明银行（Toronto-Dominion Bank）周一表示，作为在美国开出具有里程碑意义的罚单后进行的战略审查的一部分，这家加拿大贷款机构将出售其持有的美国金融服务公司嘉信理财（Charles Schwab）10.1% 的股份。【原文：Toronto-Dominion Bank will offload its 10.1% stake in U.S. financial services firm Charles Schwab , the Canadian lender said on Monday, as part of a strategic review undertaken following a landmark U.S. fine.】

item.title: 德国经济部长称欧洲准备就可能的贸易限制采取行动
item.description: 德国经济部长罗伯特-哈贝克（Robert Habeck）周一在与行业游说团体和欧盟最高贸易代表就美国的关税威胁进行讨论后表示，欧洲已准备好采取行动应对可能出现的贸易限制。【原文：Europe is prepared to act in response to possible restrictions to trade, German Economy Minister Robert Habeck said on Monday, after holding discussions with industry lobbies and the EU's top trade representative about the threat of tariffs from the U.S.】

item.title: 凯悦将以 26 亿美元收购普拉亚酒店集团
item.description: 凯悦酒店集团（Hyatt Hotels）周一表示，将以约 26 亿美元（含债务）（扣除现金）的价格收购 Playa Hotels & Resorts，以扩大其在墨西哥和加勒比海地区的业务。【原文：Hyatt Hotels will buy Playa Hotels & Resorts for about $2.6 billion including debt, net of cash, the company said on Monday, seeking to expand its presence in Mexico and the Caribbean.】

item.title: 中国比亚迪将销售 21 款搭载 "上帝之眼 "智能驾驶技术的车型
item.description: 中国电动汽车巨头比亚迪周一表示，计划开始销售 21 款配备 "天眼 "高级驾驶辅助系统（ADAS）的车型，这将加剧智能电动汽车市场的竞争。【原文：Chinese electric vehicle giant BYD plans to begin sales of 21 models equipped with its "God's Eye" advanced driver-assistance system (ADAS), it said on Monday, intensifying competition in the smart electric vehicle market.】

item.title: 亚马逊北卡罗来纳州仓库面临工会投票
item.description: 本周，北卡罗来纳州罗利郊区一家仓库的工人们将决定是否要与这家零售巨头进行集体谈判，亚马逊正面临几个月来的第二次工人工会投票。【原文：Amazon is facing its second workers’ union vote in as many months as laborers at a warehouse in suburban Raleigh, North Carolina, decide this week whether they wish to collectively bargain with the retail giant.】
